articles.title: Covid: Hospitalisation, death risk higher among South Asians in UK - MENAFN.COM
articles.description: London, May 2 (IANS) People of South Asian origin, living in the UK, are at higher risk for testing positive with Covid-19 and also at increased risks of hospitalisation, ICU admission, and death, according to an observational study published in The Lancet…

articles.title: COVID-19: South Asian people faced greater risk than others in England during second wave - Sky News
articles.description: Body weight, blood pressure, underlying conditions and even household size could be some of the key drivers, scientists say.
